description.en: Döbeln, pale and bandaged, points at a map in candlelit quarters while lying in bed.

narration.en: He dictates the movement of brigades with precise intent, shaping the battlefield from memory and instinct.

en.text: They must hold the road - Jutas cannot be lost.

info: ActionSquare centered on Döbeln’s face and pointing hand; candlelit interior; bandage visible instead of headband.
